  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.log used by org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.log 
    Class and Description
    HiveEventCounter
    A log4J2 Appender that simply counts logging events in four levels: fatal, error, warn and info.
    HushableRandomAccessFileAppender
    A File Appender that does not append log records after it has been stopped.
    NullAppender
    A NullAppender merely exists, it never outputs a message to any device.
    PerfLogger
    PerfLogger.
    PidFilePatternConverter
    FilePattern converter that converts %pid pattern to @ information obtained at runtime.
    SlidingFilenameRolloverStrategy
    A RolloverStrategy that does not rename files and uses file names that are based on a millisecond timestamp.
